entities.name: Systran SAS
keyStrengths: owns unique rights to web data
entities.growthStrategySummary: data collection is at the core of Systran’s strategy

entities.name: Machine-learning capabilities
entities.description: Cutting-edge capabilities combined with translation technologies.
At the core of Systran's strategy as a key input to neural machine translation’s accuracy. Data collected by Systran for 20 years and cleaned by Systran’s data scientists.

entities.name: Web data
entities.description: Unique data to which Systran owns rights (from an Intellectual Property standpoint), collected for the past 20 years and cleaned to serve as input for translation training processes.

entities.name: Neural machine translation
entities.description: Key technology for translation accuracy, with data collection as a core input.

entities.name: Translation models
entities.description: Continuously trained by Systran and customers relying on customized terminologies, reflecting industry terminology and translator’s communication habits.

entities.name: Customers
entities.description: Customers of Systran who continuously train translation models with Systran.

entities.name: Systran's translation software
entities.description: Can process up to 1bn requests per day and translate text from a large set of files (Incl. MS PowerPoint, PDF, pictures).

entities.name: Maintenance services
entities.description: Includes an update patch that constantly adds additional capabilities.

entities.name: Update patch
entities.description: Constantly adds additional capabilities, part of maintenance services.

entities.name: OpenNMT
entities.description: An open-source ecosystem for neural machine translation and neural sequence learning, created by Harvard NLP Group and Systran. Trained and improved based on inputs of 3rd party developers, with Systran reviewing public developers' inputs for data privacy.

entities.name: Harvard NLP Group
entities.description: Co-creator of the OpenNMT open-source ecosystem.

entities.name: Neural sequence learning
entities.description: Technology related to the OpenNMT ecosystem.

entities.name: 3rd party developers
entities.description: Developers whose inputs train and improve the OpenNMT ecosystem, and whose public inputs are reviewed by Systran.
A key characteristic of Systran's translation software.
Ambitious R&D roadmap based on a one-of-a-kind track-record of innovations.

entities.name: Neural network
entities.description: Technology used by Systran and customers to train translation models.
